DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate product reliability , therapy effectiveness user feedback Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) device in-home 6 month .
DOC.detailed_description: Existing Na√Øve CPAP user recruit 6 month in-home study Participants attend 5 study visit day 0 , 7 , 30 , 60 180 . Outcome clinical investigation include downloadable device data report , device error report participant perception questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 . Diagnosed OSA practice physician prescribe Positive Airway Pressure ( PAP ) therapy . Persons contraindicate Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) therapy . Persons significant sleep disorder ( ) ( e.g . periodic leg movement , insomnia , central sleep apnea ) . Persons obesity hypoventilation syndrome congestive heart failure . Persons require supplemental oxygen CPAP device . Persons implant electronic medical device ( e.g . cardiac pacemaker ) . Persons pregnant think might pregnant . Persons whose primary language English . Persons exist dependent unequal relationship member research team , researcher ( ) and/or person undertaking recruitment/consent process . Persons highly dependent medical care . People cognitive impairment , intellectual disability mental illness
